title: Ten days that shook the world = October = Oktyabr (TEFC) [SILENT]
creator_credit: Grigori Alekandrov, Sergei Eisenstein and Sovkino of Moscow
brief_description: A historical re-enactment of the ten days in October 1918 when the Russian Kerensky regime was toppled by the Bolsheviks.
